General.Name: Zamp S.A.
General.Description: ZAMP S.A. develops, operates, and franchisees restaurants under the Burger King and POPEYES names in Brazil. It also provides advisory and support services to Burger King restaurants, as well as sells, imports, and exports related products. The company was formerly known as BK Brasil Operação e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A. ZAMP S.A. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.
